content:
Sure, here are some recommendations for accommodations near Machu Picchu:

1. Inkaterra Machu Picchu Pueblo Hotel - This eco-friendly hotel is located in the Aguas Calientes town and is surrounded by lush gardens and stunning views of the mountains. 2. Sumaq Machu Picchu Hotel - This luxury hotel offers comfortable rooms, an on-site spa, and a restaurant that serves traditional Peruvian cuisine. 3. El Mapi by Inkaterra - This contemporary hotel offers clean and comfortable rooms, excellent service, and is located just a few minutes' walk from the train station. 4. Casa del Sol Machupicchu - This cozy hotel offers affordable rooms, a friendly staff, and is located just a 5-minute walk from the bus stop to Machu Picchu. 5. Belmond Sanctuary Lodge - This exclusive hotel is located just steps away from the entrance to Machu Picchu and offers luxury accommodations, stunning views, and excellent service. Note: It's always best to book accommodations well in advance, especially during peak tourist seasons.
